name: Sunny Moon Farm
description:
Game made in Godot 4.0 in 3 days! For Mini Jam 130: Lunar.

Theme: Lunar  
Limitation: 10 seconds    Build-in LEADERBOARDS! Compete among other players! And show us how much money you can make!
Controls KEYBOARD ONLY
WSAD - Move
QE - Rotate camera
J - Pick up
K - Use
N - Drop Credits Programmer: Blodyx
Designer: LineXx
